ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] username:password for heritrix.war
ygData.msgSnippet: You to acquire the admin role. Add something like:  ... to $TOMCAT_HOME/conf/tomcat-users.xml.

X-Yahoo-Profile: stackarchiveorg

You to acquire the 'admin' role.

Add something like:

  <user name="admin"   password="SOME_PASSWORD" roles="admin" />


... to $TOMCAT_HOME/conf/tomcat-users.xml.  Restart to be sure.  Then 
login with user 'admin' and password of 'SOME_PASSWORD'.  That should do it.

Be aware that heritrix packaged as a WAR is little tested.  There may be 
other issues lurking.

Yours,
St.Ack
